title: This game is unplayable.
body: I'm done. I've tried everything I could think of to stop the lag spikes. I did everything in the trouble shooter, have no other programs running, my pc is fine, and I've submitted multiple tickets. Obviously Riot doesn't care, this is ridiculous and I'm tired of spending money on something that won't work. Good riddance.

replies.body:
Hey RagingCondor!

I'm really sorry to hear about your ping spikes >.<  I want to make sure that we do everything we can to help resolve this issue and get your ping to be more stable and normal!  As for your tickets, reply to me and provide your ticket numbers.  Every single ticket submitted is read and responded to by a Rioter and never a bot.  This way I can make sure that the responses you received are ones trying to help resolve your issue!

Additionally, your tickets should allow me to take a look at your Network Configuration (this has sensitive information, which is why we ask for it in tickets and not here on the Boards) to see if there are any immediate problems we can identify that could be causing the lag spikes.
I feel the same way enough is enough Riot...

Whats your Internet connection + Specs OP?

I do agree but its not about the lag spikes. Its more about damn bug-splat and the crashes for me.

Is int it funny how the company with a near supremacy in this genre still doesn't have a functional support? 

9/10 you'll get 3 bots before your ever directed to a actual human being.
rito would rather worry about esports than fix any of their shit, get used to it

I hope it's better than the customer service I got. After a bizarre and mysterious three day leaverbuster ban even though I wasn't afk from any games, or received, even in error, any leaverbuster pop ups in  game. After repeated responses to a ticket in which I said over and over again the above(ie no notifications, no afks,etc) I got........cut and paste replies of "If you're having technical issues...blah blah blah."
I AGREE. FINALLY someone is at the same frustration level as me. Riot created a client equal to something I leavee in the TOILET.

Same here. I've been having huge lag spikes (my ping doesn't even move) for the last few weeks and now I got demoted and I just can't take it anymore. Every 30 seconds or so everything freezes then 5 seconds later it all teleports to normal (most of times I'll become dead).

My setup has never changed and I know this isn't on my end. I don't know what the fuck to do but I know I can't play anymore. Thanks for making me waste so much money.
